title: 依首火影ed 有無中文翻譯

replies.msg:

Kimi ni nagasare sou na kurai

Sugu wasurechatte dame da

Omou you ni dekinai dame da
Uzukumatte cha dame da

Kizutsui tatte ana aitatte
Massugu tatte irareru you ni naritai

Kimi ni makechai sou na kurai
Kimi ni nayamasare sou da
Kimi ni kikoecha dame dame dame da

Kimi o omoccha dame dame dame da

Hi ga ochite mata ochite
Uzumaite nukedashite
Konoha yurete mu ni toujite [1]
Ame ni nure tsuki ga mieru

Kimi ni makechai sou na kurai
Kimi ni nayamasare sou da
Kimi ni kikoecha dame dame dame da
Kimi ni nagasare sou na kurai
Kimi ni shite yarare sou da
Kimi o omoccha dame dame dame da

Kimi ni hamari sou na kurai
Kimi ga suki nandesu
Kimi o omoccha dame dame dame da

Utagatte bakari ja dame da
Higaisha buttecha dame da
Amaete bakari ja dame da
Mune o hatte ikanakya dame da
[1] - Konoha is the name of the village that Naruto, the main character of this anime, grew up in. The song didn't intend that though.

我可能輸給你
我會很煩
我聽不到你的聲音。

看來你可以做到
我不考慮你

我不能做我想做的

我希望能夠站直

看來你可以做到

看來你可以做到

不要只是懷疑
